strats.name: Green Brinstar Main Shaft Left-Side X-Ray Climb

to.note: This link is only for the X-Ray climb, which skips the junction altogether.

strats.name: Shinespark
note: This is specifically a shinespark that doesn't reach the top.
Needs HJB to bonk at the right place without walljumping.

Full Etecoon Walljump Climb
strats.note: Not quite the full climb, but close enough.

strats.name: Full Etecoon IBJ
strats.note: This is the full climb, since you have to drop down to 10 and start there.

note: One-way link, for falling off the tunnel.
It doesn't actually fall all the way to the bottom but this is probably close enough.

strats.note: Not considered a notable strat because executing this has no real value.

strats.name: Early Supers Quick Crumble Escape (Dual Quick Crumble)

failures.name: Crumble Failure
failures.note: Failure leaves you in node 3 with solid crumble blocks above your head.

strats.note: This one involves doing a second quick crumble escape on the way out as a means to avoid doing a crumble jump.

failures.name: Crumble Failure
failures.note: Failure leaves you in node 3 with solid crumble blocks above your head.

strats.note: Space Jump is here as an alternative to performing a crumble jump on the way out.

unlockStrats.name: Base
note: Both sides of the room must be accessed to reach all enemies and unlock the door.
Beyond that, the enemies can be killed with Power Beam.

to.note: A speedball strat can be doable here, depending on adjacent runway, but between the grey door and the number of runway tiles in this room that can't be used for that, it might be better to omit it.
